RR_verdict: We found that the ASICS GT 1000 13 excels in a fiercely competitive value-oriented market, despite a minor price hike to $110. Sure, we weren't thrilled with the $10 increase, yet the improvements—enhanced cushioning, better stability, and the introduction of PureGEL technology—made it a worthwhile upgrade. Although the energy return is on the lower end and the updated upper slightly reduces breathability, this mild stability shoe remains a top choice for runners seeking an affordable yet reliable option.
